title: England and Scotland fans discover where their opening World Cup games will be played
description: Fans are expected to rush to sort their travel and accommodation plans now that they know where and when the matches take place.
content:
England and Scotland fans have found out where their World Cup group games will be played when the tournament kicks off in June.
England, who are in Group L, will begin their tournament against Croatia in Dallas at 4pm EST (9pm BST) on 17 June. They ... [1392 chars]

title: England and Scotland find out World Cup kick-off times
description: England are handed World Cup kick-off times which suit UK audiences - but Scotland fans face later finishes during next summer's tournament.
content:
England have been handed World Cup kick-off times which suit UK audiences - but Scotland fans face later finishes during next summer's tournament.

title: Caerphilly school shuts as 'flu-like' illness hits 250 pupils and staff
description: The school says it will shut for a short "firebreak" period to allow a deep clean.
content:
More than 250 pupils and staff members have fallen ill at a secondary school, prompting a temporary closure to limit further spread.
In an email, seen by BBC Wales, the head teacher at St Martin's School in Caerphilly told parents and carers the scho... [332 chars]

title: Everton turn on style and condemn Dyche to miserable return with Nottingham Forest
description: Everton’s improvement continued with an emphatic 3-0 win over Nottingham Forest secured by goals from Nikola Melenkovic, Thierno Barry and Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall
content: Sean Dyche would not have recognised Everton on his return to the club he saved from relegation and possible administration not so long ago. The former Everton manager was greeted by plush new surroundings, a contented fanbase and a vibrant, confiden... [3388 chars]

title: Sydney Sweeney: My silence made jeans ad controversy worse
description: Actress was accused of promoting eugenics in American Eagle campaign
content:
Sydney Sweeney admitted to “widening the divide” caused by her American Eagles jeans advert by remaining silent.
The US actress, 28, known for her roles in the television series Euphoria and The White Lotus, was accused of promoting eugenics after sh... [2331 chars]
